attributes.action: To bring back arts and music into schools to aid mental health & well- being.
attributes.additional_details: The Dementia Choir has shown the impact on positive emotional response. Equally art therapy has an equal and profound impact
attributes.background: There is clear evidence that there has been a deterioration in the mental health and well-being of children and people. Equally it has been shown that arts and particularly music can have a beneficial impact. These subjects are no longer in the core curriculum and this is having a negative impact.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Art and design and music are part of the National Curriculum from key stage 1 to 3. We're not sure exactly what else you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
